options_text_path.message: Part of the path for saving text

options_images_path.message: Part of the path for saving images

options_attachments_path.message: Part of the path for saving attachments

macro_desc_title.message:
Post title
Long title is truncated to 100 characters

macro_desc_img_number_x.message:
Image number with leading zeros
Replace X with the desired number of digits

macro_desc_att_number_x.message:
Attachment number with leading zeros
Replace X with the desired number of digits

alert_first_run.message:
kemono-downloader Ver $1:
This is the first launch after the version update.
The default settings are used.
Please check and adjust them if necessary.

popup_info_text.message: Changing save paths is available on the main settings page.

help_download_text.message: If enabled, text from the "Content" section will be downloaded. All images in this section will be ignored when downloading. All links will be saved as description text.

help_download_images.message: If enabled, images from the "Files" section will be downloaded. Images in the "Content" section will not be downloaded.

help_download_attachments.message: If enabled, attachments from the "Downloads" section will be downloaded.

help_remove_duplicates_by_url.message:
If the list of downloaded files (images or attachments) contains several files that are downloaded from the same address, this setting will affect the download:
  • Enabled - the file will be downloaded only once;
  • Disabled - a copy of the file will be downloaded and saved.

help_base_path.message:
The first, general part of the path where downloaded files will be saved. Depending on the content type, the corresponding part from the fields below will be appended to it, thus forming the full path and file name for saving.
Macros are supported. When downloading files, macros will be replaced with the current values according to their description in the table at the bottom of the page. Only general macros and time macros can be used in this field.

help_text_path.message:
The second part of the path is for saving text. It may optionally contain an additional path calculated relative to the base path and, necessarily, a file name.
Macros are supported. When saving, macros will be replaced with the corresponding values as described in the table at the bottom of the page. Only general macros and time macros can be used for this path.

help_images_path.message:
The second part of the path is for saving images. It may optionally contain an additional path calculated relative to the base path and, necessarily, a file name.
Macros are supported. When saving, macros will be replaced with the corresponding values as described in the table at the bottom of the page. Only general macros, time macros, and image macros can be used for this path.

help_attachments_path.message:
The second part of the path is for saving attachments. It can optionally contain an additional path calculated relative to the base path and, necessarily, a file name.
Macros are supported. When saved, macros will be replaced with the corresponding values as described in the table at the bottom of the page. Only general macros, time macros, and attachment macros can be used for this path.

help_macro_list.message: To copy a macro, click the icon to the left of it.

warning_save_problems.message: An invalid macro was detected. The location of the error is currently highlighted in the text. Remove the added [>][<] characters indicating the error and correct the path.
